Articles.Content:
You may not be aware of this program but Space Engine simulates orbits of planets, moons and comets + spaceships! Recently, we hit 400 pages! Woo! But we're requesting talented, new members to join the wikia to keep the wiki strong as ever. When you do come to the wiki, please be polite, do not spam random pages and leave them with little to no info and do not be rude/offensive to another member's page; they spent a lot of time working on that page!!

If you're interested in joining us on the Space Engine Wikia, then here is the link: http://space-engine.wikia.com/wiki/Space_Engine_Wikia 

We would be delighted if you would join us. You will require Space Engine: http://en.spaceengine.org/ Make sure you check for any new updates as we will make new pages based upon the newest updates! 

Thank you so much! At least 400 pages and counting!

EvilPanda

Hey! It's David K, any word on you returning comments?

When's your next video coming out?

As for Space Engine, I've seen it, but i can't participate as I can't get Space Engine.

Edited May 6, 2016 by Spaceception

Just now, Spaceception said:

Hey! It's David K, any word on you returning comments?

When's your next video coming out?

A for Space Engine, I've seen it, but i can't participate as I can't get Space Engine.

Hey dude! I do plan to re-enable comments but considering I'll be uploading less (real life issues and events) there isn't much point - but don't worry, they'll be back one day as I do plan to work on YouTube far more frequently in about a year (sorry but school exams get in the way).
